name: OpenAI
summary: API for powerful language and multimodal models, including tool use and safety moderation.

name: Anthropic
summary: Claude models focused on helpfulness, safety, reliability, and multi-step tool use.

name: Cohere
summary: Enterprise-grade LLMs with classification, embeddings, and RAG-friendly workflows.

name: Mistral
summary: Fast, efficient models (open & hosted) good for cost-sensitive workloads.

name: OpenRouter
summary: Unified API for many model providers with routing, logging, and price/latency comparison.

name: Hugging Face
summary: Models, datasets, Spaces, and inference â€” the central open-source AI ecosystem.

name: LangChain
summary: Framework for LLM apps: chains, tools, agents, memory, evaluations, and tracing.

name: LlamaIndex
summary: RAG building blocks: data ingestion, indices, routers, and evaluation utilities.

name: Pinecone
summary: Managed, scalable vector database for production-grade RAG and similarity search.

name: Qdrant
summary: Open-source vector database with a hosted cloud, strong filtering, and popular SDKs.

name: Weaviate
summary: Vector database with modular stack, hybrid search (BM25 + vector), and a managed cloud.

name: Milvus
summary: Highly scalable open-source vector database for large-scale embeddings.
